data.title: Will Sandra Bullock Divorce Jesse James Over Michelle "Bombshell" McGee?
data.meta_description: After Allegations of Affair, Report Says that James and Bullock are Interviewing Attorneys
data.text:
NEW YORK (CBS/AP) Private drama plagues Oscar winner Sandra Bullock as reports surface that the actress and her husband, Jesse James, are interviewing attorneys for a possible divorce, according to celebrity gossip site TMZ.

PICTURES: Sandra Bullock vs. Porn Star

PICTURES: Michelle "Bombshell" McGee

Bullock has been dogged by tabloid reports since internet rumors surfaced that Bullock's husband of five years split after tattoo model Michelle "Bombshell" McGee claimed she had an affair with James while Bullock was making her Oscar-winning film "The Blind Side."

On Thursday, James, the celebrity motorcycle builder and reality-TV star, apologized to his wife and three children from previous relationships through a statement issued to People magazine and later obtained by The Associated Press.

"It's because of my poor judgment that I deserve everything bad that is coming my way," he said. "This has caused my wife and kids pain and embarrassment beyond comprehension and I am extremely saddened to have brought this on them."

MEDIA

PICTURES: Sandra Bullock vs. Porn Star

PICTURES: Michelle "Bombshell" McGee
